backend/main.mo: Defines an actor with access control, extensive travel comparison, hotel, ticket, VIP, and user profile types, and early profile query logic using a Map store.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three UI background‑related features and their associated source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base theme variables for light and dark modes and applying background and text styles to the body.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that sets the page title and loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes wrapped in AppLayout and RequireAuth, initializes theme provider, and renders the router with notifications.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: IDL factory defining all backend Motoko types for frontend canister communication, including users, groups, albums, hotels, tickets, and comparisons.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout, navigation, cache clearing, and showing the profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to set a public screen name and saves it via mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Guards protected routes by redirecting unauthenticated users to the sign‑in page.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnauthSignI: Displays a sign‑in screen with branding, login button, and error handling for Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/groups/ChatPanel: Renders a scrollable chat view with message sending, input handling, and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout providing navigation, footer, dynamic backgrounds, and document title updates.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing branding, current year, and a link to caffeine.ai with dynamic host identifier.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar showing branded logo, authenticated nav items, profile access, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/memory/PhotoGrid: Displays photos in a grid with hover actions for tagging and deletion, plus delete confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/memory/PhotoUplo: Handles image file selection and upload with progress tracking and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/memory/TagPeople: UI panel for adding, removing, and saving manual photo tags using friend selection or principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/offers/HotelOffe: Editor for adding, editing, and deleting hotel entries with room and pricing details.
frontend/src/components/offers/TicketOff: Manages creation, editing, and removal of ticket options with type, price, and currency.
frontend/src/components/offers/Transport: Allows adding and removing transportation offers with mode, provider, class, and price.
frontend/src/components/offers/VipOffers: Editor for VIP package entries including name, price, currency, inclusions, and perks.
frontend/src/components/profile/LegalNam: Form for viewing and updating a user's private legal name with save functionality.
frontend/src/components/results/BundleCa: UI card displaying a travel bundle’s price, ticket, hotel, transport details, and special flags like VIP or planned choice.
frontend/src/components/results/BundleSo: Sort bar component allowing users to choose sorting options like price or hotel rating.
frontend/src/components/safety/PurchaseC: Gate component requiring authentication and parental consent before showing purchasing-related content.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Central branding config defining the app name, tagline, and logo assets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for profiles, permissions, friends, legal info, and comparisons.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme variables, dark mode, and route background layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Utility function for formatting numbers as localized currency strings.
frontend/src/lib/localComparisonEngine.t: Generates trip bundles combining tickets, hotels, VIP packages, and transport with currency checks, and finds cheapest transport options.
frontend/src/lib/routeBackgrounds.ts: Maps routes to background images and resolves backgrounds with support for nested route inheritance.
frontend/src/lib/tripWindow.ts: Computes check‑in and check‑out timestamps based on concert date and stay duration.
frontend/src/lib/upgradeDetection.ts: Detects upgrade opportunities across tickets, transport, and hotel rooms by comparing quality and price against a baseline bundle.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AlbumPage.tsx: Displays an album with delete, upload, and photo grid functionality using route params and album queries.
frontend/src/pages/GroupDetailPage.tsx: Shows group details, chat, and leave‑group actions, handling message posting and membership logic.
frontend/src/pages/GroupsPage.tsx: Lists user groups, supports creating new groups, and handles sign‑in gating and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, branding, and feature cards, linking to trip builder and saved comparisons.
frontend/src/pages/MemoryFinderPage.tsx: Authenticated page for viewing and creating photo albums, with album creation dialog and loading/unauth states.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile dashboard showing identity info, legal name section, and saved trip comparisons with delete support.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Displays generated trip bundles with sorting, upgrade detection, bundle selection, and save-comparison functionality.
Lists saved trip comparisons with delete actions, handling loading, empty state, and unauthenticated access.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Redirects signed-in users to profile and shows a sign‑in screen for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/TripBuilderPage.tsx: React page for entering event and travel details, managing trip builder state, and navigating to results after validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and required plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-side tooling with ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite setup for React with environment loading, aliases, dev server proxy, build options, and II_URL validation.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, architecture notes, known issues, and required image assets.
